message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $180 to start. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm looking for something closer to $165.  It's a great price for a product of this quality.
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $150. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
